title: [1.8/1.7.10]Simple Recipes Mod 简单的合成模组
author: 1234lian
txt_content:
The simple recipes mod adds several new recipes to the game requested by several people. Some of the recipes should have been in the games, others are required for maps with the Risugami’s World Spheres mod and there are even more that are simply useful.
简单的合成模组向游戏添加一些新的合成表。多人游戏时需要其他玩家与主机都装了此Mod方可运行。


Recipes:新增合成表：

How to install:如何安装：
Download and install Minecraft Forge.
下载并安装Minecraft Forge.
Download the mod.Go to %appdata%.
下载这个模组.打开你的游戏目录.
Go to .minecraft/mods folder.
打开.minecraft/mods文件夹.
If the “mods” folder does not exist you can create one.
如果你没有mods文件夹你的话你可以创建一个.
Drag and drop the downloaded jar (zip) file into it.
将你的模组(Jar或Zip文件)拖进mods文件夹.
Enjoy the mod.
享受模组.

Download Links:
下载链接：

1.7.10
